doc.title: Very Merry Christmas Sing Along Songs
doc.plot: Get Ready to celebrate this warm and wonderful time of year, and sing along with the Christmas carols you love best! Plus, join in a jolly chorus of new holiday sing alongs - featuring your favorite Disney Characters! Learning the lyrics is easy and fun, because the words appear right on the screen. And, this dazzling DVD presentation contains exclusive, kid-friendly bonus features such as festive games and digital crafts everyone can share. Whether you're having a party, starting a brand-new family tradition or simply getting into the yuletide spirit, Disney's Very Merry Christmas Sing Along Songs brings the gift of music and laughter home for the holidays!
